study_plan_entry.title: Synergism between Art of Total Synthesis and High Level Strategic Design

free_text.Content: The following topics will be addressed:[br/][li] Selection of right (relevant?) targets[br/][li] Design of synthesis strategy[br/][li] Understanding the criteria for a successful synthesis[br/][li] Understanding the interplay between target puisuit and development of novel synthetic methodology[br/][li] Learning how to present and defend their own scientific project
free_text.Form of examination: Oral presentation together with oral exam
